data.title: Q & A: Anders Fogh Rasmussen - Film
data.meta_description: "Save the world" is just one of the items on the "to do" list of Denmark's prime minister, Anders Fogh Rasmussen, this year. And he might just do it. Thisâ€¦
data.text: "Save the world" is just one of the items on the "to do" list of Denmark's prime minister, Anders Fogh Rasmussen, this year. And he might just do it. This year he will host COP15, the United Nations Climate Change Conference that will try to find a new agreement to replace the Kyoto protocol, and Rasmussen believes his country can show the rest of the world a greener future. In a far-reaching interview he also talks about immigration, Afghanistan and what he thinks of Obama.
